explains: adv. 显著地，相当数量地；值得注意的是（用于表示某事非常重要）；意味深长地，别有含意地

sentences.en: She paused significantly before she answered.
sentences.cn: 她在回答之前意味深长地停顿了一下。

sentences.en: The President has promised to cut taxes significantly.
The two sets of figures are not significantly different.
sentences.cn: 这两组数字没有明显的差别。
